properties.name: Luang Prabang
properties.description: UNESCO town blending Lao and French colonial architecture with morning alms procession

properties.name: Kuang Si Falls
properties.description: Multi-tiered turquoise waterfall cascading through limestone pools

properties.name: Plain of Jars
properties.description: Mysterious megalithic stone jars scattered across the Xieng Khouang plateau

properties.name: Pha That Luang
properties.description: Most important national monument, gold-covered Buddhist stupa in Vientiane

properties.name: Wat Phou
properties.description: UNESCO World Heritage 1,000-year-old Khmer temple complex in Champasak

properties.name: Vang Vieng
properties.description: Stunning karst landscape with Nam Song River, caves, and adventure activities

properties.name: Si Phan Don (4,000 Islands)
properties.description: Mekong River archipelago near Cambodia with waterfalls and rare Irrawaddy dolphins
